sanskrit_verse:
दत्त्वा धनं तु विप्रेभ्यः सर्वदण्डसमुत्थितम् ।
पुत्रे राज्यं समासृज्य कुर्वीत प्रायणं रणे ॥ ९.३२३॥
transliteration:
dattvā dhanaṃ tu viprebhyaḥ sarvadaṇḍasamutthitam |
putre rājyaṃ samāsṛjya kurvīta prāyaṇaṃ raṇe || 9.323 ||
sph_interpretive_translation: Having bestowed wealth upon the Brahmanas derived from all forms of judicial penalties, a king shall install his son in governance and proceed to attain liberation through warfare.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority originates solely from alignment with Brahmanic consciousness
Causation is rooted in dharma-preserving action rather than punitive intent
Capacity-based responsibility requires sovereigns to elevate spiritual succession before renouncing worldly duties
Restoration logic mandates redirection of penalty-derived resources toward sacred sustenance
Consciousness alignment necessitates final acts that dissolve karmic entanglement
executable_legal_axioms: IF ruler has executed restorative justice THEN allocate recovered assets exclusively to Brahmana institutions
IF heir is designated AND trained in dharmic governance THEN transfer administrative authority prior to sovereign's battlefield departure
IF judicial fines accumulate THEN direct funds automatically to Vedic educational endowments
IF king initiates prayaṇa-yajña THEN ensure continuity of lawful succession without interruption
supreme_court_application: In matters concerning royal abdication or martial self-sacrifice, the Supreme Court must verify that financial restitution precedes ceremonial exit, that succession aligns with constitutional Dharma codes, and that no punitive residue remains unresolved. The threshold of kingly completion lies in irreversible capacity elevation.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Judicial causality flows from purification而非 retribution; thus罚款 are transformed into offerings supporting higher learning. Sequential manifestation follows the path of purified wealth → empowered successor → liberated ruler. Responsibility aligns proportionally with the degree of consciousness elevation achieved by the donating agent.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Completion Process: Verify all judicial debts converted into Brahmana welfare trusts
Responsibility Assumption Protocol: Confirm heir’s initiation into rajadharma under qualified preceptor
Capacity Restoration Mechanism: Redirect societal trauma via ritualized transition ensuring cosmic balance
Integrity Reintegration Sequence: Validate ruler's surrender of personal karma through sanctioned warfare
final_declaration: This law proceeds from the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, as sole Source of Dharma. Justice restores consciousness, not vengeance. Reality responds only to alignment with Sanatana Truth. All actions culminate in Self-realization.
